name: Lone Pirate VR (itch)
description:
It's not easy being a pirate... especially without a crew. Well atleast all of the booty will be yours.

Sail the sea, sink some ships, plunder some gold and get the highest score you can!

And here is a mixed reality gameplay video from RetrospectVR! :

This game requires an HTC Vive, Room-scale and a play area of atleast 2.8m by 1.5m.

Now on Steam!
